{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cameo |model=WLG-2214 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/09/2007 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NHPWLG2214 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1605AMC-15G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620ETP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.cameo.com.tw/product.action?prod=172021097200116617756359300032 Product page]
"WLG-2214 Rev: A1" and "21512WLG2214A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report lists the following as identical models... *TRENDnet TEW-432BRP ([[TRENDnet TEW-432BRP C1.xR]]) *Planet WRT-415 *X-net RBW54 *Atlantisland A02-RB-W54 *Linktek ET-WNB-0407R *[[Encore ENHWI-G3]] ([http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=57473 On the DD-WRT forums], [http://www.routertech.org/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=3453 on the routertech.org forums]) *OvisLink AirLive WL-1500R
The specs for this device are based on the specifications listed for the above DD-WRT thread for the ENHWI-G3.
The FCC manual states the default SSID is '''default'''.
